event.title: Sept. 28, was about a South Fayette teacher and coach who resigned

data.event: The story, broadcast Sept. 28, was about a South Fayette teacher and coach who resigned last year over what the school district called "inappropriate" e-mails that landed in the hands of other personnel and citizens in the district.
